title: Staying relevant as a language learning blogger or influencer in 2019

media:group.media:title: Staying relevant as a language learning blogger or influencer in 2019
media:group.media:description:
Read more here: https://www.mezzoguild.com/language-blogging/
Follow-up to my guide on blogging here: https://www.mezzoguild.com/how-to-start-a-language-blog/
I know this doesn't interest most people but from time to time I get emails asking about blogging or being an 'influencer' in the language learning niche.
This is something I've been doing now for almost 8 years straight and I've learned a lot in that time.
But each year I feel like a newbie myself as the Internet landscape is changing so rapidly - people consume information differently than they did just a few years ago.
Here are some of my thoughts and observations.
